edu.umw.cpsc.collegediversity
Class FreshmanHousingSelection

java.lang.Object
  edu.umw.cpsc.collegediversity.FreshmanHousingSelection

public class FreshmanHousingSelection
extends java.lang.Object

A Singleton class that can assign a set of freshman Students to their freshman dorms.

See Also:
UpperclassHousingSelection

Method Summary
 void assign(sim.util.Bag newFreshmen)
          Assign the set of (presumably freshman, but this is not checked) students passed to their freshman dorm rooms, in a way that does not take race into account.

Method Detail

instance

public static FreshmanHousingSelection instance()
Singleton pattern.

assign

public void assign(sim.util.Bag newFreshmen)
Assign the set of (presumably freshman, but this is not checked) students passed to their freshman dorm rooms, in a way that does not take race into account. (compare assignByRace.) As a precursor (side effect) to this, any freshmen already existing in freshmen dorms will be removed.

assignByRace

public void assignByRace(sim.util.Bag newFreshmen)
Assign the set of (presumably freshman, but this is not checked) students passed to their freshman dorm rooms, in a way that does take race into account. (compare assign.) Minorities will have a higher probability of rooming with other minorities than they would otherwise have had. As a precursor (side effect) to this, any freshmen already existing in freshmen dorms will be removed.
